content.rendered:
Home

Primary Level

  • NCERT-Based Curriculum: Our primary curriculum follows the NCERT framework as per CBSE guidelines, emphasizing fluency in spoken and written English.
  • Core Subjects: Primary subjects include English, Hindi/Kannada, Mathematics, and Environmental Science.
  • Computer Education: Students gain computer literacy through theory and practical hands-on experience.
  • Holistic Learning: Our curriculum integrates value education, arts, crafts, and sports activities.
  • Homework and Projects: Parents play a crucial role in guiding students with homework and projects.
